# Add your images here

Place images in this folder with these filenames:

| Filename | Location |
|----------|----------|
| `patricia-hero.jpg` | Hero section (desktop) |
| `audience-professionals.jpg` | Who we serve |
| `testimonial-1.jpg` | First testimonial (square, headshot) |
| `testimonial-2.jpg` | Second testimonial (square, headshot) |
| `regulation-reset-session.jpg` | Regulation Reset section |
| `private-session.jpg` | Private Sessions section |
| `law-firm-workshop.jpg` | For Law Firms section |
| `patricia-portrait.jpg` | Patricia MacAdam portrait |
| `patricia-working.jpg` | Patricia at work (wide/landscape) |
